ComicInfo.Summary: After having captured Sarah, Nichila and her squad try to escape from David and Goliath. In the ensuing chase, David is confronted with the difficult choice of saving a woman's life or to continue chasing Nichila in the effort to rescue his sister.
ComicInfo.Characters: Ms. Wilson,David Hart,Goliath,Sam Davidson,Thomas Slade,Captain August,Nichila,Sarah Hart
